thread.title: Great location and good pricing for new york
thread.title_full: Great location and good pricing for new york - Review of Hilton Garden Inn New York - Times Square Central, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: sammymadison
title: Great location and good pricing for new york
text:
I came here based upon other reviews in TA and the good ones were spot on.
The location is smack in the middle of Times Square and is very new. The rooms are clean, modern and large by New York standards.
Staff is pleasant and attentive and the on site restaurant is dual purpose.... cafe by day and good Italian at night ( with a lot of ambience.
I will be back
